short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a life saving extension in case your boss or wife shows up

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
in order to protect the user from peering eyes, or accidently showing information to unintend poeple, this extension will group together specific tabs in one collapsed group or close specific tabs using keyboard shortcuts,  the user can control which tabs should be grouped or closed in the settings page of the extension.

Usage:

Settings:
Shift+Ctr+3: open settings

Panic:
Shift+Ctr+1: activate panic mode
Shift+Ctr+2: dactivate panic mode
